## useSubscriber() function


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function useSubscriber<Subscriber>(): {
    subscribe: (subscriber: Subscriber) => void;
    subscribers: Subscriber[];
};
```

{ subscribe: (subscriber: Subscriber) =&gt; void; subscribers: Subscriber\[\]; }
